channel.title: Rzpk
channel.description:
Changed Capacity From 40 to 200
We have added many things
Upgraded forums at rzscape.com Upgraded client downloadable from above. Added 3200 Npcs. All free to play shops added at exact npcs. Starter is 50k and some lobsters Kalphite Queen in Al Kharid East Ardougne is new theif area. Smithing and mining in Lumbridge Crafting in al kharid.
But enough of that.
I think pictures describe it more.
[IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz9-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz8-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz7-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz6-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz5-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz4-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz3-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz2-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz17.png[/img] [IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz16.png[/img] [IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz15.png[/img] [IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz14.png[/img] [IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz13.png[/img] [IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz12.png[/img] [IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz11.png[/img] [IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz10-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz1-1.jpg[/img]
Thank's For looking.

Upgraded client downloadable from above.
